channel.title: Home on Dongsheng Deng's homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Dongsheng Deng's homepage

item.title: Another Note on A blogdown Tutorial
item.description: I just discovered an awesome tutorial on blogdown written by Alison. I have to admit this is the best blogdown tutorial I have seen so far.

item.title: A Quick Note on Two Beautiful Websites
item.description: To me, the two most impressive websites based on blogdown are: Rob J Hyndman’s personal website. Live Free or Dichotomize by Lucy and Nick et al. I’m sure there will be more.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.

item.title: About Hugo XMin
item.description: XMin is the first Hugo theme I have designed. The original reason that I wrote it was I needed a minimal example of Hugo themes when I was writing the blogdown book. Basically I wanted a simple theme that supports a navigation menu, a home page, other single pages, lists of pages, blog posts, categories, tags, and RSS. That is all. Nothing fancy. In terms of CSS and JavaScript, I really want to keep them minimal.

item.title: Research Topics
item.description: Welcome to the board of research, here are some records of my research road. Paper Dongsheng Deng. Inflation policy under regime instability, 2012. (paper, slides) Dongsheng Deng, Rongwei Chu. Relationship between migrants’ remittance and life satisfaction, 2014. (paper) Zhao Chen, Dongsheng Deng. Risks and investor’s risk awareness in online P2P lending: evidence from transactions of lending platforms, 2017. (paper, slides) Conference The Third China Financial Forum, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics, Shanghai, November 2017.

item.title: Some Resources
item.description: Welcome to the board of Resource, here are some useful tools and tutorials. Stata Stata Learning Module Stata Class Notes Python DownloadHelper.py LaTeX ElegantLaTeX Book Templates: Designed by Dongsheng Deng and Liam Huang. LaTeX Beamer tutorial. (Beamer tutorial 2015, Beamer tutorial 2017) LaTeX graphic tutorial. (graphic tutorial) Design I designed the official logo of the Institute for Advanced Study of Wuhan University. (pdf, png)

item.title: iFriend Links
item.description: My Blog: My blog website. Xin Ye: My undergradute Roommate. Ph.D. candidate from the Department of Mathematics, Purdue University. Liam Huang: Coauthor of the ElegantLaTeX Note/Book Templates, programmer, TeXer. Murong Wang: Member of the ElegantLaTeX program, data scientist. LaTeX Studio: Palace for LaTeX user, maintained by ChinaTeX.
